originDescription: He was born Kal-El on the planet Krypton, before being rocketed to Earth as an infant by his scientist father Jor-El, moments before Krypton's destruction...
superpowers: Solar energy absorption and healing factor
catchPhrase: Look, up in the sky, it's a bird, it's a plane, it's Superman!

originDescription: Bitten by a radioactive spider, Peter Parker gained the proportionate strength, speed, and agility of a spider...
catchPhrase: With great power comes great responsibility.

originDescription: Diana, princess of the Amazons, trained warrior. When a pilot crashes and tells of conflict in the outside world, she leaves home to fight a war to end all wars...
catchPhrase: I will fight for those who cannot fight for themselves.

originDescription: After witnessing the murder of his parents, Bruce Wayne dedicated his life to fighting crime and became the Dark Knight of Gotham City...
superpowers: Peak human physical and mental conditioning

originDescription: Genius, billionaire, playboy, and philanthropist Tony Stark built a high-tech suit of armor to save his own life and protect the world as Iron Man...
Steve Rogers volunteered to be transformed into a super-soldier to fight in World War II. He became the patriotic symbol of freedom and justice...
catchPhrase: I can do this all day.

originDescription: Scientist Barry Allen gained superhuman speed after being struck by lightning and exposed to chemicals, becoming the fastest man alive...
catchPhrase: I am the fastest man alive.

originDescription: Thor, the Norse god of thunder, was banished to Earth and forced to learn humility. With his mighty hammer Mjolnir, he protects both realms...
catchPhrase: I am Thor, son of Odin!

originDescription: Dr. Bruce Banner, a brilliant scientist, was exposed to gamma radiation, causing him to transform into the raging green monster known as the Hulk...
